name: The Elevator (WhyMentionMyUsername)
description:
What do you do in the elevator? Or what does it feel like everybody else does?

Hint: Try to piss everybody off.

Controls: Mouse (movement + LMB + RMB).

Music credits:

Local Forecast - Elevator Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
